ud3.2:8.2: maṃ → mama (s1-3), nikkhamantassa → nikkhamantaṃ (pts1 aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pāṭhantaraṃ)
ud3.2:9.2: samiñjitaṃ → sammiñjitaṃ (bj, s1-3, km, pts1), samiñjeyya → sammiñjeyya (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
ud3.2:11.3: saṅkhyampi → saṅkhampi (bj), nopeti kalabhāgampi nopeti upanidhimpi nopeti →  na upeti, kalampi na upeti, kalabhāgampi na upeti, upanidhimpi na upeti (sī1), na upeti, kalabhāgampi na upeti, upanidhimpi na upeti (syā1-3, pā1)
ud3.2:12.3: bhagavati brahmacariye”ti → bhagavā brahmacariyeti (s1-3, pts1) | bhagavā brahmacariyanti (mr)
ud3.2:18.5: kho tvaṃ, nanda → kho te nanda (bj, s1-3, pts1) | kho nanda (mr)
